list_definition.definition: a quarter of a circle or a quarter of the circumference of a circle

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Find the area of a quadrant of the circle whose diameter is 22.4 cm.

list_definition.definition: an instrument which was formerly used in astronomy and navigation for measuring the altitudes of stars

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: John Cabot would have used a quadrant to find his way across the Atlantic Ocean to discover Canada.
